","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_modules","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs the FASTEN ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modules","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" section by iterating over all internal modules discovered during analysis. It defines module-level metadata, assigns unique numeric identifiers to namespaces, and records source location information for each namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b49dce57-dd07-4330-b332-38fc0a490635","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function translates raw module and namespace data into the structural foundation required by the FASTEN schema.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6d7bf2e3-23d3-4bab-992c-19113b0b4da2","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"fb0ef97f-5be4-430b-83bf-3222c642be93","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_modules","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to describe the internal structure of the analyzed package in a standardized way. The generated module definitions provide the reference points used by class hierarchies and call
